acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle attributes in accordance with custom Class Info Strategies
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleAttributesInAccordanceWithCustomClassInfoStrategies

test-step.description: Given a Class Info Strategy which approves only attributes belonging to NonEJBPojo
Given a Podam Factory with custom Class Info Strategy
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.NonEJBPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the String field ff_PGAu1r6 cannot be null or empty
Then the Object should not be null
